sources.title: Manchester: area guide

sources.title: Living in Manchester: area guide
sources.snippet: Manchester is the ultimate urban playground and a great place to live: a city that pulses with culture, history and endless possibilities.

sources.title: A GUIDE TO THE NEIGHBOURHOODS OF MANCHESTER
sources.snippet: In this article, we take a look at five of the best neighbourhoods for everyone from the first time buyers through to hipster hotspots for young professionals.

sources.title: A FIRST TIMERS' GUIDE TO MANCHESTER
sources.snippet: The land of the Mancs is rich with culture, history, science, and art (how do, Lowry!), and honestly, I wasn't expecting to fall for it the way I did.

sources.title: Thinking About Moving To Manchester? Here's Some Advice
sources.snippet: People often say that by living in Manchester you get to enjoy the bustle of the city and its plentiful amenities, without having to pay London prices.

sources.title: An Expat's Guide to Living in Manchester
sources.snippet: Living in Manchester is ideal for those looking for a mid-size city with plenty of job opportunities and a lower cost of living.
